name: JSONEncoder.DataEncodingStrategy
desc: The strategies for encoding raw data.

items.name: case base64
items.desc: The strategy that encodes data using Base 64 encoding.

items.name: case custom((Data, Encoder) -> Void)
items.desc: The strategy that encodes data using a user-defined function.

items.name: case deferredToData
items.desc: The strategy that encodes data using the encoding specified by the data instance itself.
